description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget 'NotificationsScreen' that displays a list of user notifications, fetches data from a notifications service, and handles loading and error states.

classes.name: NotificationsScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays notifications to the user.

classes.name: _NotificationsScreenState
classes.description: State implementation for NotificationsScreen, manages fetching notifications and UI states.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes state and triggers initial load of notifications.

methods.name: _load
methods.description: Fetches notifications from the service, updates UI according to loading/error/success state.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree based on current UI state, displaying loading indicator, error message, or list of notifications.
